text: Kharibam is a Meetei Manipuri surname or family name which has Indian origin. People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India. == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar- surname.aspx?surname=Kharibam * http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Kharibam Category:Meitei surnames
title: Kharibam
